Summary Note:
The Relationship Manager (RM) first met Estefanía Alba Muñoz at a charity gala in Madrid. They had a long conversation about their mutual interest in philanthropy and decided to stay in touch.
Having worked for over 17 years, Estefanía Alba Muñoz brings a wealth of experience and expertise to her current role. She is known for her strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in her decision to join.
Family Background: Estefanía Alba Muñoz is currently single. She does not have any children.
Education Background:
Estefanía finished secondary school at IES José Manuel Blecua Pamplona in 2003.
Estefanía attended Seville School of Fine Arts and graduated in 2009.
Occupation History:
Estefanía Alba Muñoz is a seasoned professional with over 17 years of experience.
Estefanía Alba Muñoz launched her career as a Journalist at Telefónica S.A., where she gained valuable experience from 2008 to 2012.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Editor at Atresmedia Corporación de Medios de Comunicación S.A. in 2013, further expanding her skill set.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 130000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She owns townhouse in Castellón de la Plana, where she resides. It is worth 1190000 EUR.

She purchased villa in Castellón de la Plana, where she spends her holidays. It is valued at 2220000 EUR.

Following the passing of her grandmother, a successful Stock Trader, she received an inheritance of 5570000 EUR in 2016, which she has used to secure her financial future.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome her as a new client.
